FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: Learn more about our upholstery services for ships, cars, and furniture

Q1.TITLE: What Upholstery Services Do You Offer?
Q1.CONTENT: We offer professional upholstery services for ships, cars, and all types of furniture. Whether it's marine-grade cushioning, car seat repairs, or sofa restorations, we provide high-quality, durable, and custom solutions.

Q2.TITLE: Do You Provide On-Site Upholstery Services?
Q2.CONTENT: Yes, we offer on-site upholstery services where needed, especially for large furniture items or installations in ships and commercial areas. We aim for maximum convenience and professional delivery.

Q3.TITLE: Can You Customize Designs and Materials?
Q3.CONTENT: Absolutely. We offer a wide range of fabrics, foams, and leather materials. Based on your preference and space (marine, car, or home), we help you choose the most suitable and durable options.

Q4.TITLE: How Long Does an Upholstery Project Take?
Q4.CONTENT: Project timelines depend on the size and complexity of the work. Simple repairs may take 1-2 days, while full reupholstery of boats or multiple seats can take a few days to a week. We always give clear estimates before starting.

Q5.TITLE: Do You Offer Repair and Maintenance Services?
Q5.CONTENT: Yes, we repair torn fabrics, fix sagging foam, restore roof linings, and replace damaged panels. We also offer regular maintenance for marine and auto interiors to extend their life and comfort.

BANNER.SUBTITLE: Crafted with precision. Built to last. Trusted by professionals.
BANNER.DESCRIPTION: At {{company}}, we specialize in high-quality marine upholstery for ships, yachts, and luxury boats, delivering durable and elegant solutions with expert craftsmanship and premium marine-grade materials resistant to water and salt.

LANDING.TESTIMONIALS_TITLE: Don't just take our word for it - See what ship and yacht owners are saying
LANDING.FEATURES_TITLE: Additional Features & Services We Provide to Our Clients

TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_1: The work was exceptional! The quality of upholstery and finishes exceeded my expectations. The materials used are high-quality and resistant to salt water.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_2: The entire fleet was renovated with excellent quality and on time. The team is professional and the after-sales service is outstanding.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_3: High expertise and craftsmanship in dealing with luxury yachts. Attention to detail and quality is unmatched in Kuwait.

FEATURES.WATERPROOF_MATERIALS_DESC: We use high-quality materials resistant to water, salt, and UV rays.
FEATURES.CUSTOM_DESIGN_DESC: We design and manufacture custom upholstery pieces according to client specifications and preferences.
FEATURES.MARINE_EXPERTISE_DESC: Over 15 years of experience in upholstering all types of ships, boats, and yachts.

FEATURES.UV_RESISTANT_DESC: Materials resistant to scorching sun rays and harsh weather conditions.
FEATURES.QUICK_DELIVERY_DESC: We adhere to specified delivery dates while maintaining the highest quality standards.
FEATURES.ON_SITE_SERVICE_DESC: We provide measurement and installation services at the marina or vessel location.
FEATURES.MAINTENANCE_SUPPORT_DESC: Periodic maintenance services and immediate repairs to ensure upholstery longevity.
FEATURES.FIRE_RESISTANT_DESC: Fire-resistant materials that meet international marine safety standards.
